input.sentences: as we began our trip to the market | it became clear that we were not the early birds we thought we were .
our favorite vegetable stand was full and the crowd showed no signs of subsiding .
we strolled around until we found another stand selling vegetables .
the variety offered was much greater than our usual one | and yet there were only one or two people looking at the goods casually .
and what do you know | we found the most perfect tomatoes and carrots we 've ever had !
